title: Penalties
context: ยง443B-14 Penalties. Any violation of this chapter is punishable by a fine of not more than $5,000 per violation. Any officer, agent, or employee of a collection agency who personally participates in any violation of this chapter by the collection agency shall be subject to penalties prescribed in this section. [L 1987, c 191, pt of ยง1; am L 2012, c 52, ยง2]
